Desc.eng: The General didn’t expect these monsters... and we reached the nests... where huge things breed terrible spiders...
He got out with his best soldiers... and left us here... to die.
I’ll take care of that nest.
Don’t worry. I’ve already cleared out those nests of terrors.
You stay here, Harker’s brave minion! Our boys will get here…. eventually.
Don’t go anywhere, Harker’s little minion! Our boys will get here…. eventually.
